mapper.update: update smart_alarm_threshold set labs_id = #{labsId,jdbcType=CHAR}, pm25_limit = #{pm25Limit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, co2_limit = #{co2Limit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ch2o_limit = #{ch2oLimit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, tvoc_limit = #{tvocLimit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, temperature_limit = #{temperatureLimit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, humidity_limit = #{humidityLimit,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, air_limit = #{airLimit,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select id, labs_id, pm25_limit, co2_limit, ch2o_limit, tvoc_limit, temperature_limit, humidity_limit, air_limit from smart_alarm_threshold where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
